trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the options required for processing a select method result from a select operation.
trans-unit.target: 封装处理选择操作的 select 方法结果所需的选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions"></xref> class.
Indicates whether paging is done automatically by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 该值指示是否自动完成分页<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that paging is done automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该分页是自动完成的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether sorting is done automatically by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 该值指示是否排序自动完成<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that sorting is done automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该排序是自动完成的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> which is used for auto paging and auto sorting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>后者用于自动分页和自动排序。</xref:System.Type>
